about_the_game:
Welcome to Gaggi Clicker, the ultimate click-and-collect game! Immerse yourself in the world of "Gaggis" – charming little creatures just waiting to be collected by you.

Features


Simple Gameplay: Click to collect Gaggis and expand your empire.
Diverse Gaggis: Discover a variety of Gaggi species, each with unique traits and abilities.
Upgrades and Power-Ups: Invest in upgrades and power-ups to increase your collection rate and find special Gaggis.
Events and Challenges: Participate in time-limited events and complete daily challenges to earn rare rewards.
Vibrant Graphics: Enjoy colorful and lovingly crafted graphics that bring the world of Gaggis to life.
Community Features: Join a lively player community, exchange tips, and compare your collection with other players.
Are you ready to become the ultimate Gaggi collector? Embark on an exciting adventure and discover the magic of Gaggis!

Gaggi Clicker – Click, Collect, and Conquer!

name: Gaggi Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
